title: Anticipating the Conference:  Paul Maloney on the Stance of the Feet
post: This one seems to be good, and I am looking forward towards it. I have been for a long time inclining that the traditional Barbet’s single nail through metatarsals of both feet is unlikely -for several reasons. I preferred two nails theories, but such combined approach may be interesting, as it may potentially explain all questions about feet position and bloodmarks.
author: O.K.
